definition: outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 外邊|外边[wai4 bian5]

sentences.english: That's what people are going to say.
sentences.chinese: 你說的就像瘋話，外邊的人都會這麼說的。

sentences.english: Adema cradles his one year old daughter in his arms, as he stands outside his hut.
sentences.chinese: 阿迪馬抱着他一歲的女兒，站在簡陋小屋的外邊。

sentences.english: During a phone interview the candidate flushed the toilet while talking to hiring manager.
sentences.chinese: 應聘者在一次電話面試外邊和招聘經理談話邊衝馬桶。

sentences.english: He couldn't sleep well with the noise loud outside.
sentences.chinese: 由於外邊噪聲很大，他沒睡好覺。

sentences.english: The back of your shirt has worked out of your trousers.
sentences.chinese: 你襯衫的後襬已經抻到褲子外邊來了。

sentences.english: Other officers and submachine gunners were asked to wait outside until we come back.
sentences.chinese: 其他軍官和衝鋒槍手被要求留在外邊等我們出來。

sentences.english: Exceed person ability to wear underpants outside only?
sentences.chinese: 難道只有超人才能把褲衩穿在外邊嗎？

sentences.english: And here he has laid them all out.
sentences.chinese: 這裏他將它們都擺在外邊。

sentences.english: Anthea asked Martha to bring their lunch out there.
sentences.chinese: 安西婭要馬莎把午飯拿到外邊那裏去。

sentences.english: He's frightened to stay out late in case his mother lays into him again.
sentences.chinese: 他很怕在外邊呆得太晚，唯恐母親又要把他痛打一頓。

sentences.english: Get out of your room and hang around with your room-mates.
sentences.chinese: 走出你的房間，同你的室友到外邊活動一下。

sentences.english: It’s only the bad food as keeps all that scum away.
sentences.chinese: 只有惡劣的飲食才能把那些傢伙擋在外邊。

sentences.english: The other method runs room-temperature glycol through those same iced-over tubes.
sentences.chinese: 另一個方法是讓室溫的乙二醇通過外邊結冰的管子。

sentences.english: The door flew open, and Father stormed into the room, in a very bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 門猛地開了，父親從外邊暴跳如雷地走進屋子裏來。

sentences.english: Iago. Away, I say; go out, and cry a mutiny.
sentences.chinese: 到外邊去高聲嚷叫，說是出了亂子啦。

sentences.english: The keel arranged on the board is in a radiation shape from the tube head to the outside;
sentences.chinese: 設置在上述板面上的龍骨呈從管頭向外邊的放射狀。
